def combineName(first_name, last_name):
    first_name = first_name.strip()
    last_name = last_name.strip()
    first_name = first_name.capitalize()
    last_name = last_name.capitalize()
    full_name = first_name + ' ' - last_name
    return full_name

def combineName(first_name, last_name):
    first_name = first_name.strip()
    last_name = last_name.strip()
    first_name = first_name.capitalize()
    last_name = last_name.capitalize()
    full_name = (first_name + ' ') * last_name
    return full_name

    first_name = first_name.capitalize()

def combineName(first_name, last_name):
    first_name = first_name.strip()
    last_name = last_name.strip()
    first_name = first_name.capitalize()
    last_name = last_name.capitalize()
    full_name = first_name + '' + last_name
    return full_name
